short_summary: SINGLE REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL FOR a NEW HYDRAULIC STOPLOG LIFTER
description: The Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) invites tenders for the acquisition of a new hydraulic stoplog lifter that will be used to install and maintain electric power distribution lines on the Transmission System in Canada. The new hydraulic stoplog should be custom designed to fit the PWGSC’S existing transmission system and should be able to penetrate the frozen earth in order to access and distribute electricity to the remote areas where the distribution facilities are not readily available. The new stoplog lifter should be able to generate the proper pressure and flow to operate the electrical power distribution system safely and efficiently.
